name: Get User
CREATE TELEGRAMUSER User
func:
msg.topic = `INSERT INTO TELEGRAMUSER (id,username,firstname,wintotal,total,streak,maxstreak) VALUES (
  "${msg.user.id}",
  "${msg.user.username}",
  "${msg.user.firstname}",
  "${msg.user.wintotal}",
  "${msg.user.total}",
  "${msg.user.streak}",
  "${msg.user.maxstreak}"
);`
return msg;

name: Get Active games
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT * FROM GAMES where gameday='"+ msg.myymd +"' and id=" + msg.user.id
return msg;

name: CREATE New Game
func:
msg.topic = `INSERT INTO GAMES (id,gameday,counter,wordsplayed,iscompleted,wordoftheday) VALUES (
  "${msg.user.id}",
  Date('now'),
  0,
  "[]",
  0,
  "${msg.wordoftheday}"
);`
return msg;

name: Get Active games
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT * FROM GAMES where iscompleted=false and gameday='"+ msg.myymd +"' and id=" + msg.user.id
return msg;

msg.payload = msg.payload;
return msg;

const token = '5119461428:AAGSvle8ucVqWMfZmyf1ACz-PywatZ2mYhE';
let chatId = msg.user.id;
var phrases = [
    "You've Won!",
    "Awesome!",
    "You win!",
    "Awesome job, my boy!",
    "You did it!",
    "Don't feel smug",
    "F*** you",
    "Anyone could have done that!",
    "Hmm, why even try though?",
    "You sad saaad man!",
    "Are you crazy?",
    "Why the happy face?",
    "Was is worth the effort?",
    "It's just a game.",
    "That's fantastic!",
    "How did you do that?!",
    "Splendid!",
    "You've accomplished the impossible!",
    "I applaud your effort.",
    "What a win!",
    "Terrific!",
    "Bravo!",
    "Hurray!",
    "What an achievement!",
    "You are a legend",
    "This cat praises you!",
    "Nice job!",
    "Here, take my paw!",
    "Huh?! you won? how?",
    "Noooo, why did you win?",
    "Meh, I could do that too.",
    "So what? I can do it too.",
    "Ok",
    "Well deserved!"
    ]
var choicephrase = phrases[Math.floor(Math.random() * phrases.length)]
var params = "?chat_id=" + chatId + 
          "&photo=" + "https://cataas.com/cat/says/" + encodeURI(choicephrase);
msg.url = 'https://api.telegram.org/bot' + token + '/sendPhoto' + params;
return msg;

name: Get Active games
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT * FROM GAMES where gameday='"+ msg.myymd +"' and id=" + msg.payload.chatId;
return msg;

name: Select Word Of The Day
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload[Math.floor(Math.random() * msg.payload.length)];
return msg;

CREATE TELEGRAMUSER Table
func:
msg.topic = `Create table TELEGRAMUSER (
  id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, 
  username TEXT NOT NULL, 
  firstname TEXT NOT NULL, 
  wintotal INTEGER DEFAULT 0, 
  total INTEGER DEFAULT 0, 
  streak INTEGER DEFAULT 0, 
  maxstreak INTEGER DEFAULT 0
  )`
return msg;

name: DROP GAMES Table
func:
msg.topic = `DROP TABLE IF EXISTS TELEGRAMUSER`
return msg;

name: CREATE GAMES Table
func:
msg.topic = `CREATE TABLE GAMES (
	gameid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    id INTEGER not null,
	gameday DATE not null,
    counter INTEGER NOT NULL,
    wordsplayed TEXT,
    wordoftheday TEXT,
	iscompleted BIT DEFAULT  0,
	FOREIGN KEY (id) REFERENCES TELEGRAMUSER (id) 
			  ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION
)`
return msg;

name: DROP GAMES Table
func:
msg.topic = `DROP TABLE IF EXISTS GAMES`
return msg;

name: CREATE GAMES Table
